title: Easy way to convert html to markdown with python
author: gaojiuli
content:
readme.md tomd crawling online articles such news, blogs, etc. want save in markdown files not databases.tomd has ability converting html converted markdown. a html 't described markdown, tomd 't convert right.tomd is python tool.road map basic support full support(nested list) command line toolinstallationpip install tomdgetting startedinputimport tomdtomd.tomd('

h1

').markdown# tomd.convert('

h1

')output# h1usage tomd import tomdhtml="""

h1

h2

h3

h4

h5
h6

paragraph< href="https://github.com">linkimg

  • 1
  • 2
  • 3
  1. 1
  2. 2
  3. 3
blockquote

inline code

block code

delbold<>italic<>bold italic

th1th2
tdtd
tdtd
"""tomd(html).markdownresult# h1## h2### h3#### h4##### h5###### h6paragraph[link](https://github.com)![img](https://github.com)- 1- 2- 31. 11. 21. 3> blockquote`inline code`block code~~del~~**bold***italic****bold italic***---|th1|th2|------|td|td|td|td
